subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: Philippe Gilbert of Belgium pulled ahead in the overall standings in the Vuelta a España, using a strong surge to the finish line on a sweltering afternoon to win the hilly third stage from Marbella to Malaga.
snippet: Philippe Gilbert of Belgium pulled ahead in the overall standings in the Vuelta a España, using a strong surge to the finish line on a sweltering afternoon to win the hilly third stage from Marbella to Malaga.
